com.sillysoft.vox
Class UnitStackGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.sillysoft.vox.UnitStackGroup

public class UnitStackGroup
extends java.lang.Object

UnitStackGroup is a group of UnitStacks, each of which may have different owners or types.
